summary: THE DASH IN OUR 2013  YUKON IS CRACKED AROUND THE AIRBAG AND POSES A SERIOUS CONCERN FOR SAFETY IN THE EVENT THAT AIRBAG IS DEPLOYED.  THIS PROBLEM IS UNDERSTOOD BY GENERAL MOTORS AND THE DEALERSHIP THAT CURRENTLY HAS POSSESSION OF OUR YUKON NEEDS TO REPAIR THIS  DASHBOARD UNDER WARRANTY  RATHER THAN PUTTING A DASH COVER OVER IT. MCELVEIN GMC IN SUMMERVILLE SC HAS THE YUKON CURRENTLY. 844-241-1281
